name: Your Story Ends Here
flavor: You bend the fate of a foe, willing them to die.

metadata.flavor: You bend the fate of a foe, willing them to die.

effects.tier1: 9 + I corruption damage; R < WEAK, weakened (save ends)

effects.tier3: 19 + I corruption damage; R < STRONG, weakened (save ends)

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: If this damage kills the target, you and each ally within distance can spend a Recovery.
